tool_description: Counter Strike Global Offensive Steam Market Price API (cspapi.to)
name: cspAPIto
title: cspAPIto

api_list.name: Get price history
api_list.description: Get price history by item id
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cspapito.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/items/61df2fb6b253185bf266f901/price-history"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cspapito.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cspapito.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/items/{id}/price-history"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cspapito.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Suggest item name
api_list.description: Get all suggestions of item namy by query

api_list.name: Get by ID
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cspapito.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/items/61df2fb6b253185bf266f901"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cspapito.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/items/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cspapito.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search items
api_list.description: It allows you to search for item data with many query parameters.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Limit number of results: 
Default: 10
Max: 100

optional_parameters.name: sortBy
optional_parameters.description: sort results by any other field

optional_parameters.name: quality
optional_parameters.description:
One of:
  'Consumer Grade',
  'Mil-Spec Grade',
  'Industrial Grade',
  'Restricted',
  'Classified',
  'Covert',
  'Base Grade',
  'Superior',
  'Distinguished',
  'Exceptional',
  'Master',
  'Extraordinary',
  'High Grade',
  'Remarkable',
  'Exotic',
  'Contraband'

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description:
type of item, one of: 
- Container
- Sticker
- Agent
- Pin
- Music Kit
- Graffiti
- Pass
- Tag
- Key
- Patch
- Tool
- Gloves
- Gift
- Rifle
- Pistol
- Shotgun
- SMG
- Heavy Machine Gun
- Sniper Rifle
- Knife

optional_parameters.name: statTrak
optional_parameters.description: Search only for items with/without StatTrak

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description:
Page of the result
Default to 1

optional_parameters.name: subtype
optional_parameters.description:
One of:
  'AK-47',
  'AUG',
  'AWP',
  'CZ75-Auto',
